dayplanner

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • dayplanner.Activity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HomeActivity, OtherActivity, SchoolActivity

    public class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single generic activity object. This is used for manipulation of activities. The attributes of home, school and other activities are transferred into a generic activity so generic operations can be performed. Once completed, the original activity type is restored by receiving the newly altered attributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Activity()
      Creates an empty generic activity, sets all attributes to null.

      creates a new generic activity with the given attributes.
      Activity(java.lang.String title, Time sTime, Time eTime, java.lang.String comment, java.lang.String location)
      creates a new generic activity with the given attributes.

        title - the title of the activity.

        comment - a comment that best describes the activity.

        comment - a comment that best describes the activity.

        public java.lang.String toString()
